title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item cannot be selected.
EB: The item in the library outline view should be selectable on the first attempt.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label or any item in the library file. 
2. Attempt to select the label (or any item) in the library outline view. 
3. Verify that the item can't be selected.
